text: quick question: in the template requirements, I am unclear on something. Do we have to support IE11 or not. I remember months ago when it was announced in this slack channel that we didn’t have to support it, but the documentation implies we do
I would by default support all HubSpot supported browsers

I understand wanting to support it; however, that is the article that conflicts with messages that I have seen officially announced in this slack channel.

I’d like to have a theme approved that uses css variables – and I’d hate to do the legwork to create it and then have it denied.
as long as it has a fallback, i think it would be approved
I want to list a module to the marketplace but it doesn't come up when I select Modules under the "Choose your product from the list of approved templates below". Am I doing something wrong?
